Challenges in Using the Checklist 
The WHO Safe Childbirth Checklist Collaboration evaluation revealed a number of motivational 
challenges in using the Checklist, such as the belief that the Checklist was too complex and 
took too much time. Coaches were able to address these challenges by conducting ongoing 
supervision and training, and reinforcing the impo
